name: Callie Garnett
bio: Callie Garnett is the author of the chapbooks Hallelujah, I'm a Bum (Ugly Duckling Presse, 2015), and On Knowingness (The Song Cave, 2017). Her poems have appeared in Prelude, Company, jubilat, The Recluse, and elsewhere. She works as an assistant editor at Bloomsbury Publishing and lives in Brooklyn.
